title: Iron
desc:
Post 1210
*This stuff is as strong as iron. Wait. Nevermind*
- At any time you may turn this card into 866 **Maganese**
- Secretly and Permanently gain 1 muscle.
- You also Secretly get 2 Shield.
- When someone attempts to identify this card, the muscle and shield become revealed.
- Someone may attempt to identify this card when played. if they identify it correctly, they discard a card, if it is incorrect, they draw 3 cards. Only one person may guess once.
